Description: 2025 was a year of lots of relection and thought. They say the Year of the Snake is when you're meamt to go through a lot og change to realise what you want. That part I'm still trying to figure out but I have certain goals I want to fulfill for 2026. A whole year of adulting for the first time where I haven't been in education, took my first solo trip to Peru and spent plenty of time with family and friends.

2024 was probably the year where my life had the most changes. I got to do a bit of travel both in the US and Europe, fulfilled a life goal of graduating Parsons School of Design with a Master's degree. Moved back home to Dublin, started my first 'big girl job'. A lot of change and growth for sure!

2023 felt like a blur. Immersed in my final undergrad semester, I witnessed an incredible showcase of my classmates' capstones. After backpacking in Europe, I moved to New York for my Master's. It has been one rollercoaster of a year!.

In 2022, work and assignments consumed my days, leaving gaps in my timeline as I recorded little. However, a summer internship revealed my passion for product and UX design, an exciting revelation shaping my future as a designer.

This timeline encapsulates moments of my life, starting in 2022, all the way to the present. In the past four years, I've seen the world come out of a global pandemic, earned my undergrad and masters degree, moved to NYC, moved back to Dublin, got my first design job and explored plenty of new cities on different trips with friends and family. As I expand this timeline, I can't wait to see what's to come.
